data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=zoujtNrzgG8Q7kNvgGvLbJe&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=A9kNkKsnXjZrSyZIv3VjMed&oh=00_AYAhsGdd-Nxg7TzXse2kZRyCVm_aGNQSSV_lrDEf5P4T_Q&oe=66F3F237)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=mFw9p4R7H_4Q7kNvgFZrH-d&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=A9kNkKsnXjZrSyZIv3VjMed&oh=00_AYBNLR09IUVYRm--vJTqQYAkDi7cwc2U-PQtqu5jf93hng&oe=66F3FFD2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gfeH1Dyyv68Q7kNvgFJJuT0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=A9kNkKsnXjZrSyZIv3VjMed&oh=00_AYDKOHh5vMNjGJdMn-eoIaj_5vimq8i_WElrVP23Q4CUWw&oe=66F3EB09)
